original_title: Dear Memories - Eine Reise mit dem Magnum-Fotografen Thomas Hoepker
overview: Thomas Hoepker is one of the most famous photographers of his lifetime. Now he is slowly losing his memory. He embarks on one last journey together with his wife, a trip they once took more than 50 years ago.
tagline: One photographer's journey to recapture memories created more than 50 years ago.
title: Dear Memories - A Journey with Magnum Photographer Thomas Hoepker
